text:
<@U7AS8L4MR> submitted several varients of the logo - huge thank you for your work on that.

If anyone knows or wants to figure out how to set that as our logo in the banner of the documentation site, that’d be awesome <https://github.com/TheWebTech/CrankShaft/issues/75>
We're rolling with a jekyl theme integrated into github pages
got it...the last time I saw a discussion Slate was being mentioned so I missed the resolution

the convo kinda got mixed between a github issue and the slack.

basically we kinda decided, lets pick a github pages theme - all support markdown. Build something out, and if we outgrow the theme, the advantage is all of the content is in markdown files so we can instantly swap it out and migrate to something better at that time.

here’s the current docs site <http://thewebtech.github.io/CrankShaft>

Here’s all of the github issues related to the docs site <https://github.com/TheWebTech/CrankShaft/projects/2>
that includes a github issue for picking a domain name
